{ 
 "name": "email_body", 
 "value": "The CDD Self Diagnostics release has been run and the email test was successful. "
 "Ansible Tower Job ID": "%GenericToken%"
 "Jenkins Build Number": "%GenericToken%" "Jira Ticket Updated": "%GenericToken%" 
 "SonarQube Quality Gate": "%GenericToken%"
 "TFS Build Number": "%GenericToken%"
 "TFS Build Result": "%GenericToken%" 
 "TFS Source Control Revision ID":"%GenericToken%",

}
